Html:
Hello,

We have a big application currently having PRISM 2.0 library. We want to upgrade those libraries to PRISM 4.5.

Request you to provide, guidelines for how to migrate from 2.0 to 4.5 version.

Thanks in Advanced.

 

parthiv,

Hi Parthiv,

As far as I know the Prism for .NET 4.5 release does not include any functionality changes over Prism 4.1 (and the main changes in this other version were primarily focused on updating Prism for Silverlight 5 and addressing issues identified by the community on CodePlex). Hence, you could use the same guidance provided on how to upgrade from Prism 2.x to any 4.x version. This can be found in the following section of the Prism documentation:

  • Appendix D: Upgrading from Previous Versions, Upgrading from Prism 2.x

I hope this helps,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
